home.welcomeTitle: Welcome to this VueJs Demo application
home.welcomeDescription: What is this? It's simply a VueJS application to test the client side rendering potentiality. VueJS is a client-side rendering framework... bla bla bla bla bla bla bla bla bla bla bla bla bla bla bla bla bla bla. And so on.

feature.javascriptDescription: Vue is powered by javascript, the best language in town!
feature.clientSideDescription: This is a client side rendering application. It means the server provides you the stuff for the app and your computer elaborates it in order to display.
feature.fastDescription: Extremely fast application, on another level compared to the competition.
feature.programmerFriendlyDescription: Easy syntax and fast developement for every programmer.
feature.debuggingDescription: Error detection with appropriate messages for a fast debugging.
feature.otherDescription: Discover more on the Vue.js official website and documentation.

dashboard.deleteAccount: Do you want to delete your account?
dashboard.deleteAccountConfirm: Enter the code below to confirm

deletePost.notFound: The post you want to delete doesn't exists
deletePost.authorizationRequired: You can't delete other user's post

createComment.notFound: The post you want to comment doesn't exists

errors.emptyFields: You have to compile all fields
errors.differentPasswords: Passwords have to be the same
errors.weakPassword: Password must contain: 1 lower and 1 upper key, 1 number, 1 symbol and must be at least 6 characters long
errors.userAlreadyExists: This username is already in use

posts.deletePostConfirm: Do you want to delete the post?

about.why: Why did you develop this web application?
about.whyAnswer: I developed this web application to practice my front-end skills and to try out a framework like vue.js
about.howAnswerServer: On the server side, i used node.js and express, and also:
about.howAnswerClient: On the client side, i used vue.js, and furthermore:
about.developerDescription: is the developer of this web application. He has a great passion for computer science and has experience in web and mobile application development. He has also a great interest for cyber security.
